item.title: Chitãozinho & Xororó - Pura Emoção
item.description:
Achy Breaky Heart by Billy Ray Cyrus. It’s been raised by 3 semitones so beginner ukulele students can play along. For educational use. Chords Used: C & G (or C & G7)
SAME SONG IN F (using F and C or C7): https://youtu.be/KsjrpecVEoU
If you found this video useful please subscribe. If you want to be notified of future videos please click on bell next to subscribe.

item.title: Percy Sledge - When a Man Loves a Woman
item.description:
For educational use. Optimized for GCEA ukulele. Key of C.
Chords Used: C, Am, Em, F, G7, D7
As performed by Percy Sliedge
Tutorial Video (GCEA & DGBE): https://youtu.be/_iXuaXJSGns
Video created on the iPad Pro using Luma Fusion. The ukulele chord font is available at ukefarm.com. Background (modified to look like Taylor Swift's "Lover" album cover) is from motionbolt.com.
Do you have a request for a song to be made into a video? First, check the index of play alongs at www.ukeplayalongs.com to make sure your song isn't already available. If it isn't, please fill out this request form: https://forms.gle/84rgm7kFNJWnTqFB6

item.title: Taron Egerton - I'm Still Standing
item.description:
For educational use. Optimized for GCEA ukulele. Key of Cm and C. Raised a whole step from the original (Bbm and Bb). This is an updated video, just for the intro slide and the description. Sadly, you cannot update a video with a new version on YouTube. I left a link to this video on the original video.
As performed by Taron Egerton in “Sing.” I had originally had Taron Egerton's name wrong, and a number of people wrote comments to complain about it.
My boys enjoyed Sing and frequently sing this song. I had started working on but moved on to other videos. Katie Denure (One Music School) posted a tutorial today (https://youtu.be/m_Xoe9g00oc), which inspired me to wrap up this video. I took away some of the fast Ab Bb C changes that occur at the end of some phrases...feel free to add them back in your own practice. This video offers some good Barre chord practice (partial and full) with Cm, Ab, and Bb.
Video created on the iPad Pro using Luma Fusion. The ukulele chord font is Chordette for Education, available at ukefarm.com.
Visit the sister ukulele channel to this channel, YouTube.com/ukestuff

item.title: Joe Brown - Joe Brown - I'll See You In My Dreams - Jools Holland - 2008_UGC
item.description:
**NOT FOR BEGINNERS**
I'll See You In My Dreams by Joe Brown And The Bruvvers. For educational use. Chords Used: A7, Am, Bb, Bb6, Bb6-2, Bbm6, Bbmaj7, C, C7, Cm6, Cmaj7, D, D7, D7-2, D7(HI), D9, Dm, E7, E7-2, Edim, Em7, F, F/C, F6, F6-5, F7, Fmaj7, G7 (yes, this song uses 28 chords). The video is from YouTuber Elisa M. and may be found at https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=VWERLNXIZGc. The chord progressions I used were heavily inspired by Jim’s Ukulele Songbook, which may be found at https://ozbcoz.com/Songs/downloadpdf.php?ID=3748%2Csongbook&fbclid=IwAR2UAs9814iikntmCk_pnDdsa9bE964sFKWluY5DTEEr4dIH5qDr2sdSB50 .
If you found this video useful please subscribe. If you want to be notified of future videos please click on bell next to subscribe.

item.title: The Thanksgiving Song - Ukulele Play Along (no lyrics)
item.description:
**The same play along song, but with lyrics, may be found here - https://youtu.be/ch5pyySDpEs .
Now Thank We All Our God (Nun Danket), also known as the Thanksgiving Hymn or the Hymn of Thanksgiving. For educational use. Chords Used: C F Dm G G7 Am Em A
If you found this video useful please subscribe. If you want to be notified of future videos please click on bell next to subscribe.

item.title: Mama Cass - Dream A Little Dream Of Me
item.description:
Ukulele play along
Dream A Little Dream Of Me - The Mamas & The Paps Music by Fabian Andre and Wilbur Schwandt and lyrics by Gus Kahn
Using the chords: A A7 Bm B7 C E7 F Fm F#m G7 Ab
Suggested Strum Patterns: D DU D DU or DU DU DU DU
This is not an easy play along but with lots of practice it is very playable and devinitely worth the work.
This video is meant for educational purposes and ukulele lessons.
No copyright infringement intended.

item.title: Guava Jam Ukulele Play Along
item.description:
For educational use. Optimized for GCEA ukulele. Key of C.
Chords Used: C, Gsus4, G7, F, D7, Ab, C7
As performed by The Ka'au Crater Boys.
This song has become a part of the traditional ukulele repertoire as a solo (you can find versions on the web if you would like to learn it), but in this case, you will be acting as the "rhythm section" underneath the solo.
I did not create a tutorial for this video, and you can play any strumming pattern that goes along with the rhythm section.
Video created on the iPad Pro using Luma Fusion. The ukulele chord font is available at ukefarm.com.
Do you have a request for a song to be made into a video? First, check the index of play alongs at www.ukeplayalongs.com to make sure your song isn't already available. If it isn't, please fill out this request form: https://forms.gle/84rgm7kFNJWnTqFB6

item.title: Christopher Davis-Shannon - Don't Call Me Honey
item.description:
For educational use. For GCEA Ukulele. Key of F, a whole step higher than the original version.
Chords Used: F, F7, Bb, Bbm6, C7, D7, G7, Bdim7, E7, A7, Bm
As performed by Christopher Davis-Shannon. Special thanks to him, as he gave me permission to use this song and also provided help with the chords shown . Incidentally, he plays the song "in C" but on a ukulele tuned up a minor third (i.e. Eb).
Tutorial Video (GCEA & DGBE):
Video created on the iPad Pro using Luma Fusion. The ukulele chord font is available at ukefarm.com.

item.title: Billie Eilish - i love you
item.description:
Ukulele play along - Easy
I Love You - Billie Eilish
Using the chords: Am Cmaj7 Dm F G G7
Suggested Strum Patterns: D DU D DU or single strums
This video is meant for educational purposes and ukulele lessons.
No copyright infringement intended.

item.title: Various Artists - The Window Cleaner
item.description:
Ukulele play along
When I'm Cleaning Windows - George Formby
Using the chords: A7 B7 C D D7 E7 G G7 Gdim7
Suggested Strum Patterns: D DU DU DU
Notes: The audio has been slightly lowered to make it easier to play
This video is meant for educational purposes.
No copyright infringement intended
